scenario_text.value:
How could they do something so awful? I can’t
take it...

Saki... I feel your pain, but we can’t get
upset here.
I know... I know that! Still...
I can’t forgive them for this.

All of the kids here must’ve had fun memories
waiting for them in the future...
Everything’s over when you die...
(Saki... She’s shaking so much.)

Do you think these kids had all the fun they
could? Do you think they lived happily?

(Good question... They seemed to have happy
lives when we came here before.)
(Would saying that be some comfort to her?)

(It may be too cold of me to outright say
that I’m not sure.)
(How should I answer Saki?)
I’m sure they had fun.
I don’t really know.
I’m sure they had fun.
I’m sure they lived happy lives.
You really think so? Happy days, full of joy?

Well, I’m sure those kids had their fair
share of sadness and pain, but...

Yeah, I think so. I mean, those kids gave
their all to whatever they did.

When we came here before, they desperately
tried to protect Miu...

That’s why I think they enjoyed themselves as
much as they could when the time came.
Yeah... That makes sense.

They must’ve had tons of fun experiences in
their lives.
I don’t really know.

I honestly don’t know if their lives were
happy and fun.

No one can say for sure, except the kids
themselves.

Still, I’m sure they lived their lives to the
fullest.
Yeah! I think so, too!
You’re right. Forgive the weird question.

Guys... I’m sorry, y’know? Sitting around
here thinking about this...
It isn’t what we should be doing now, is it?

We should be thinking about how to save as
many of the kids here as we can.
